summary: Gorillaz is a unique British band created by Damon Albarn and Jamie Hewlett in 1998. It's known for its four animated members: 2-D, Murdoc, Noodle, and Russel. Their music videos and cartoons bring the band to life. Gorillaz mixes different music styles like hip hop and electronic. They've released many successful albums, winning a Grammy and other awards. The band has sold over 27 million albums and continues to create new music, recently releasing their eighth album, Cracker Island, in 2023.
title: Gorillaz
